title: .NET 10.0 Breaking Changes
description: Breaking changes introduced in .NET 10.0 across all technology areas

breaks.title: Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Client package deprecated
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 10 where the Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Client package has been deprecated.

breaks.title: Cookie login redirects are disabled for known API endpoints
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 10 where cookie authentication no longer redirects to login or access denied URIs for known API endpoints.

breaks.title: Exception diagnostics are suppressed when IExceptionHandler.TryHandleAsync returns true
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 10 where exception diagnostics are no longer recorded when IExceptionHandler.TryHandleAsync returns true.

breaks.title: IActionContextAccessor and ActionContextAccessor are obsolete
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 10 where IActionContextAccessor and ActionContextAccessor are marked as obsolete.

breaks.title: IPNetwork and ForwardedHeadersOptions.KnownNetworks are obsolete
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 10.0 where IPNetwork and ForwardedHeadersOptions.KnownNetworks have been obsoleted in favor of System.Net.IPNetwork and KnownIPNetworks.

breaks.title: IncludeOpenAPIAnalyzers property and MVC API analyzers are deprecated
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 10 where the IncludeOpenAPIAnalyzers property and its associated MVC API analyzers are deprecated.

breaks.title: Razor runtime compilation is obsolete
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 10.0 where Razor runtime compilation APIs have been marked obsolete.

breaks.title: WebHostBuilder, IWebHost, and WebHost are obsolete
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 10 where WebHostBuilder, IWebHost, and WebHost are marked as obsolete.

breaks.title: Deprecation of WithOpenApi extension method
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in ASP.NET Core 10 where WithOpenApi extension methods have been deprecated and produce a compiler warning.

breaks.title: Default .NET container tags now use Ubuntu
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change where the default .NET container tags, like `10.0`, use Ubuntu.

breaks.title: ActivitySource.CreateActivity and ActivitySource.StartActivity behavior changes
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 10.0 breaking change in core .NET libraries where ActivitySource.CreateActivity and ActivitySource.StartActivity behavior is modified.

breaks.title: System.Linq.AsyncEnumerable in .NET 10
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where the AsyncEnumerable class is now included.
affected_apis: Ix.NET v7.0: .NET 10 and LINQ for IAsyncEnumerable\<T>

breaks.title: BufferedStream.WriteByte no longer performs implicit flush
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where BufferedStream.WriteByte no longer performs an implicit flush when the internal buffer is full.

breaks.title: C# 14 overload resolution with span parameters
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in core .NET libraries where overloads with span parameters are applicable in more scenarios.

breaks.title: Default trace context propagator updated to W3C standard
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where the default trace context propagator is switched from Legacy to W3C.

breaks.title: 'DynamicallyAccessedMembers' annotation removed from 'DefaultValueAttribute' ctor
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where a 'DefaultValueAttribute' constructor is no longer annotated with 'DynamicallyAccessedMembers'.

breaks.title: DriveInfo.DriveFormat returns Linux filesystem types
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in core .NET libraries where DriveInfo.DriveFormat on Linux systems returns Linux kernel filesystem type strings instead of mapped magic constants.

breaks.title: FilePatternMatch.Stem changed to non-nullable
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where FilePatternMatch.Stem property was changed from nullable to non-nullable.

breaks.title: Consistent shift behavior in generic math
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in core .NET libraries where shift operations in generic math now have consistent behavior.

breaks.title: Specifying explicit struct Size disallowed with InlineArray
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where specifying explicit Size to a struct decorated with InlineArrayAttribute now throws TypeLoadException.

breaks.title: LDAP DirectoryControl parsing is now more stringent
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in core .NET libraries where LDAP DirectoryControl parsing is now more stringent.

breaks.title: MacCatalyst version normalization
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in core .NET libraries where MacCatalyst version components are normalized.

breaks.title: .NET 10 obsoletions with custom IDs
breaks.description: Learn about the APIs that have been marked as obsolete in .NET 10 with a custom diagnostic ID.

breaks.title: .NET runtime no longer provides default termination signal handler
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where the runtime no longer provides a default termination signal handler.

breaks.title: Arm64 SVE nonfaulting loads require mask parameter
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where Arm64 SVE nonfaulting load APIs now require a mask parameter as the first argument.

breaks.title: GnuTarEntry and PaxTarEntry exclude atime and ctime by default
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where GnuTarEntry and PaxTarEntry no longer automatically set access time and change time fields.

breaks.title: CompositeMLDsa updated to draft-08
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where CompositeMLDsa was updated from draft-07 to draft-08 of the Composite ML-DSA for use in X.509 Public Key Infrastructure specification.

breaks.title: CoseSigner.Key may now be null
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where CoseSigner.Key may now be null when backed by Post-Quantum Cryptography algorithms.

breaks.title: MLDsa and SlhDsa 'SecretKey' members renamed
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where MLDsa and SlhDsa members were renamed from using 'SecretKey' to using 'PrivateKey'.

breaks.title: OpenSSL cryptographic primitives not supported on macOS
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where OpenSSL cryptographic primitives are no longer supported on macOS.

breaks.title: .NET 10 requires OpenSSL 1.1.1 or later on Unix
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where OpenSSL 1.1.1 or later is required on Unix platforms.

breaks.title: Environment variable renamed to DOTNET_OPENSSL_VERSION_OVERRIDE
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in .NET cryptography where the environment variable CLR_OPENSSL_VERSION_OVERRIDE was renamed to DOTNET_OPENSSL_VERSION_OVERRIDE.

breaks.title: X500DistinguishedName validation is stricter
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in cryptography where X500DistinguishedName validation is stricter.

breaks.title: X509Certificate and PublicKey key parameters can be null
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where key parameters in X509Certificate and PublicKey can be null.

breaks.title: BackgroundService runs all of ExecuteAsync as a Task
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where BackgroundService now runs the entirety of ExecuteAsync on a background thread instead of running the synchronous portion on the main thread.

breaks.title: Null values preserved in configuration
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where configuration providers now preserve null values instead of treating them as missing values.

breaks.title: Message no longer duplicated in Console log output
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where `Message` is no longer duplicated in Console log output using the JSON formatter.

breaks.title: DynamicallyAccessedMembers annotation removed from trim-unsafe configuration APIs
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where DynamicallyAccessedMembers annotations were removed from trim-unsafe Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration APIs.

breaks.title: Fix issues in GetKeyedService() and GetKeyedServices() with AnyKey
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where GetKeyedService() and GetKeyedServices() behavior changed when using KeyedService.AnyKey as the lookup key.

breaks.title: ProviderAliasAttribute moved to Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions assembly
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where the ProviderAliasAttribute class moved from the Microsoft.Extensions.Logging assembly to the Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions assembly.

breaks.title: Environment variable renamed to DOTNET_ICU_VERSION_OVERRIDE
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in globalization where the environment variable CLR_ICU_VERSION_OVERRIDE was renamed to DOTNET_ICU_VERSION_OVERRIDE.

breaks.title: dotnet.acquire API for VS Code no longer always downloads latest
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change where the dotnet.acquire VS Code API no longer always checks for the latest runtime version before returning a path.

breaks.title: Casting IDispatchEx COM object to IReflect fails
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where casting a COM object that implements IDispatchEx to IReflect now fails.

breaks.title: Single-file apps no longer look for native libraries in executable directory
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where single-file apps no longer look for native libraries in the executable directory.

breaks.title: Specifying DllImportSearchPath.AssemblyDirectory only searches the assembly directory
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where specifying DllImportSearchPath.AssemblyDirectory as the only search flag restricts the search to the assembly directory.

breaks.title: Streaming HTTP responses enabled by default in browser HTTP clients
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where streaming HTTP responses are enabled by default in browser HTTP clients.

breaks.title: HTTP/3 support in System.Net.Http disabled by default with PublishTrimmed
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where HTTP/3 support is disabled by default when PublishTrimmed or PublishAot is set to true.

breaks.title: URI length limits removed
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in networking where URI length limits of around 65K characters have been removed.

breaks.title: More restricted annotations on InvokeMember/FindMembers/DeclaredMembers
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where System.Reflection APIs InvokeMember, FindMembers, and DeclaredMembers use more restricted annotations instead of DynamicallyAccessedMemberTypes.All.

breaks.title: Type.MakeGenericSignatureType argument validation
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in core .NET libraries where Type.MakeGenericSignatureType validates that the genericTypeDefinition argument is a generic type definition.

breaks.title: Code coverage EnableDynamicNativeInstrumentation defaults to false
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where dynamic native instrumentation is disabled by default when collecting code coverage.

breaks.title: MSBUILDCUSTOMBUILDEVENTWARNING escape hatch removed
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change where the MSBUILDCUSTOMBUILDEVENTWARNING environment variable is no longer supported.

breaks.title: Change default workload configuration from 'loose manifests' to 'workload sets' mode
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where the default workload update mode changed.

breaks.title: NuGet packages with no runtime assets aren't included in deps.json
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where NuGet packages that don't contribute runtime assets might be excluded from deps.json files.

breaks.title: dnx.ps1 file is no longer included in .NET SDK
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where the dnx.ps1 script is no longer included in Windows versions of the .NET SDK.

breaks.title: .NET CLI `--interactive` defaults to `true` in user scenarios
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where the --interactive flag defaults to true in user-centric scenarios.

breaks.title: dotnet CLI commands log non-command-relevant data to stderr
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where some dotnet CLI commands log verbose and non-command-relevant data to stderr instead of stdout.

breaks.title: `dotnet new sln` defaults to SLNX file format
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where `dotnet new sln` creates SLNX-format solution files instead of SLN-format files.

breaks.title: dotnet package list command now performs restore by default
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where the dotnet package list command now performs a restore before listing packages.

breaks.title: project.json is no longer supported in dotnet restore
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where dotnet restore no longer supports project.json based projects.

breaks.title: 'dotnet tool install --local' creates manifest by default
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change where 'dotnet tool install --local' now creates a manifest by default if no tools manifest is found.

breaks.title: .NET tool packaging might create RuntimeIdentifier-specific tool packages
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in the .NET 10 SDK where .NET tool packaging might use RuntimeIdentifiers to create platform-specific tools

breaks.title: 'dotnet watch' logs to stderr instead of stdout
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where 'dotnet watch' emits its internal-facing log messages to stderr instead of stdout.

breaks.title: Double quotes in file-level directives are disallowed
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where double quotes in file-level directives are disallowed.

breaks.title: HTTP warnings promoted to errors in dotnet package list and dotnet package search
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where HTTP warnings are promoted to errors in dotnet package operations.

breaks.title: MSBuild custom culture resource handling
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in MSBuild 17.14 where custom culture resource handling now requires explicit opt-in.

breaks.title: PackageReference without a version raises an error
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where PackageReference without a version raises NU1015 error instead of NU1604 warning.

breaks.title: NU1510 is raised for direct references pruned by NuGet
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in the .NET 10 SDK where NU1510 is raised for unnecessary direct package references.

breaks.title: NUGET_ENABLE_ENHANCED_HTTP_RETRY environment variable removed
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where NUGET_ENABLE_ENHANCED_HTTP_RETRY environment variable no longer disables exponential retry.

breaks.title: NuGet logs an error for invalid package IDs
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where NuGet validates package IDs when constructing URLs and throws exceptions for invalid formats.

breaks.title: 'dotnet restore' audits transitive packages
breaks.description: Learn about a breaking change in the .NET 10 SDK where 'dotnet restore' also produces security vulnerability warnings for transitive packages by default.

breaks.title: PrunePackageReference privatizes direct prunable references
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in the .NET 10 SDK where PrunePackageReference automatically marks directly prunable PackageReference with PrivateAssets=all and IncludeAssets=none.

breaks.title: ToolCommandName is not set for non tool packages
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where ToolCommandName is only set for projects with PackAsTool set to true.

breaks.title: System.Text.Json checks for property name conflicts
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where System.Text.Json validates that user-defined property names don't conflict with reserved metadata property names.

breaks.title: XmlSerializer no longer ignores properties marked with ObsoleteAttribute
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where properties marked with ObsoleteAttribute are now serialized by XmlSerializer instead of being ignored.

breaks.title: Renamed parameter in HtmlElement.InsertAdjacentElement
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in Windows Forms where the parameter `orient` was renamed to `orientation`.

breaks.title: Applications referencing both WPF and WinForms must disambiguate MenuItem and ContextMenu types
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where applications referencing both WPF and WinForms must disambiguate MenuItem and ContextMenu types.

breaks.title: .NET 10 obsoletions in Windows Forms
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change where some Windows Forms APIs have been marked as obsolete.

breaks.title: System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip uses System RenderMode by default
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 for Windows Forms where System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip uses a different default value for the RenderMode property.

breaks.title: System.Drawing OutOfMemoryException changed to ExternalException
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where System.Drawing GDI+ OutOfMemory errors now throw ExternalException instead of OutOfMemoryException.
affected_apis: Other System.Drawing types that use GDI+ internally

breaks.title: TreeView checkbox image truncation
breaks.description: Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in Windows Forms where the TreeView checkbox image is truncated under certain conditions.

breaks.title: Incorrect usage of DynamicResource causes application crash
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where incorrect usage of DynamicResource now causes application crashes.

breaks.title: Empty ColumnDefinitions and RowDefinitions are disallowed
breaks.description: Learn about the breaking change in WPF in .NET 10 where empty Grid.ColumnDefinitions or Grid.RowDefinitions declarations now cause MC3063 compilation errors.
